title: PBE
body:
Is the PBE closed? I thought that riot wanted the opinion from a wide variety of players but the only ones I see/ know are on it are high elo players, I thought I would sign up, but there is an error so I'm guessing that the PBE is closed and no one can join it.

Is the page just crashing or is the PBE actually closed?

replies.body:
We noticed some people have been having a few issues getting onto the PBE signup page. We absolutely want anyone who is interested in PBE to apply, so we have another page you can use to apply! [**Click Here**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup) to try this signup page instead.

Also, we typically pick summoners based on what we're testing, for instance, if we're reworking a champion we'll choose people who play a large number of games as that champion. Check out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) for more details!

"· Error: 500 ·
Something’s gone hextechnically wrong.

Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem."

It still doesn't work at all.
